Name: Electron
Description: Electron is an open-source framework for building cross-platform desktop applications using web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Name: NodeGUI
Description: NodeGUI is an open-source library for building native desktop applications using JavaScript and CSS styling. It's lightweight and works with React.

Name: NW.js
Description: NW.js (previously known as Node-WebKit) is an open-source framework for building desktop applications using web technologies like HTML and JavaScript.

Name: Meteor
Description: Meteor is an open-source platform for building web, mobile, and desktop applications using JavaScript. It provides full-stack capabilities.
